recently_completed.title: Fix Git Configuration Issue in CrewAI
recently_completed.summary: 2025-09-12 17:53 — Successfully fixed Git configuration issue! Added user.email and user.name to Dockerfile for persistent setup. CrewAI agents can now perform Git commits without configuration errors. Complete CrewAI workflow is fully functional.
